page.title: 10Clubs for adults
page.content:
There are many different clubs and groups in Felton and Thirston. Some are based in the Village hall others are held in pubs and houses Some clubs hold functions that other people can attend(for fund-raising). Because of the distances to the big towns there needs to be a lot going on in the village.
There are 2 Senior Citizens Clubs organising activities and outings. There is a Ladies Leek Club and Vegetable Club at one of the pubs. The proceeds from the annual show are used to benefit the community. There is a Thursday Club(young wives), History Society,Young Farmers,Cycling and Rifle clubs.There are pool clubs and darts teams from both pubs.The school P.T.A.organises Fayres,trips and a local Pantomime.
